Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis

Interface Summary
TickLabelNumberFormatter Implement this class to override the look of RangeAxis tick labels.
Timeline An interface that defines the contract for a Timeline.
 

Class Summary
DomainAxis  
OverviewAxis An implementation of ValueAxis which renders a miniature zoomed-out overview of the whole chart.
RangeAxis A RangeAxis is an ValueAxis that represents values, typically on the y-axis.
SegmentedTimeline A Timeline that implements a "segmented" timeline with included, excluded and exception segments.
StockMarketDateAxis  
ValueAxis An ValueAxis is a class responsible for mapping points in data space to points in screen space, as well as maintaining state related to drawing axis ticks and labels.
